entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 24 April 2023
